summary: A simple and convenient way to hide the corpse of your victims. Roleplayer ? Looking for immersion ? Playing a thief or assassin ? Come get your dose !
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/Ih3F6.png[/img][/center]
[center][i]A really simple and convenient way to hide the corpse of your victims.[/i][/center]

[center][b]DESCRIPTION[/b] : Adds a new book close to Riverwood that will teach you how to hide a body.[/center]

[center]_________________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[center][b]DETAILS :[/b] Animations and small visual effects [i]( to hide popping and transitions )[/i] are included, but don\'t expect something really fancy. Pretty straightforward right now. 

I\'m open for everything, but keep in mind that my scripting abilities are [b]really[/b] limited. What can i say, i can\'t into Papyrus. [i]Still, i will try to do my best to include good ideas and suggestions.[/i] [/center]

[center][b]HOW DOES IT WORK[/b] : The first step is to find the book that will teach you the \" voice / spell \". You can\'t really miss it.[/center]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/o8tUg.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][b]It\'s working like a shout, you will have to select the spell in the magic tab and press your shout key to trigger the actual effect. Like any regular shout.[/b]

Second step is to find a body, aim at it and get somewhat close to it, and press your shout key. 

Enjoy ![/center]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/6P6iy.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/bddyY.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/OKiEq.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][b]CONDITIONS & ADVANCED DETAILS[/b] : 

? Your weapon should not be drawn, otherwise nothing will happen.
? You have to be somewhat close to the body otherwise nothing will happen.

? Yes, you can hide everything. Even dragons. Why ? Well you tell me. [i]Subject to change if it bothers people.[/i]
? Yes, the bloodstains and other decals will stay where they are. The mod will only disable the \" selected \" body and nothing else. 

? Don\'t forget to loot the body or [i]whatever you have to do[/i] before hiding it. Once it\'s gone, it\'s [b]gone.[/b]

?Trying to hide something that is still alive will... not work ( aeueueaeue ).

[b]INSTALLATION[/b] : Use NMM or drag & drop the Data folder into your main Skyrim folder. Activate the hidebodies.esp before launching the game.

[b]COMPATIBILITY[/b] : 

I\'m waiting for the first feedback. But honestly i don\'t see how this mod could conflict with [b]anything[/b] else. 

[b]LAST WORDS[/b] : 

Hope you will enjoy hiding everything as much as i do. 

[i]If you think the mod is worth your endorse... well endorse ![/i][/center]
author: Drakenof aka Dorak
